plot: A thirty-something geek attempts to collect every officially licensed game for the Nintendo Entertainment System. As games are added to his collection, an attempt is made to complete each.
title: The NES Chronicles
plot_es: A thirty-something geek attempts to collect every officially licensed game for the Nintendo Entertainment System. As games are added to his collection, an attempt is made to complete each.
plot_en: A thirty-something geek attempts to collect every officially licensed game for the Nintendo Entertainment System. As games are added to his collection, an attempt is made to complete each.
